item.title: Donate Online
item.description: Murugan Temple uses PayPal for accepting online donations in a secure manner. Please click the "Donate Now via PayPal" (green-button) below to be redirected to PayPal where you can specify the amount you wish to donate and complete the transaction. If you need a list of services that are available at Murugan Temple, please click here. We thank you on behalf of Murugan Temple. item.title: About Murugan Temple
item.description: தமிழால் இணைவோம் முருகன் அருள் பெறுவோம் The history and development of Murugan Temple of North America is a fascinating and simultaneously heart-warming experience for those who have been involved since its inception. It is a story to be told, read and preserved for posterity. It is the story that reflects the glory of Lord Murugan and His immeasurable blessings to all His devotees, wherever they may live and worship him.

item.title: Murugan Temple Endowment Fund
item.description: Murugan Temple of North America Endowment Fund What is an Endowment? An endowment is any asset donated to and for the perpetual (everlasting) benefit of a non-profit organization. The donation is usually made with the requirement that the principal remain intact and money earned from investing the principal be used for a specific purpose. Endowment creates an ongoing source of income and provides Growth, Financial Safety and Stability to the organization.

item.title: Murugan Temple Volunteers
item.description: Murugan Temple is run by volunteers like you. You can join our global community of volunteers by simply scanning the barcode above or by visiting the link here. You will be redirected to our WhatsApp group where you can join and begin participating. It's simple as 1-2-3. Our volunteer activities includes: General Administration Cultural committee Fund Raising Activities Finance committee Front-Desk management Garland and Puja Food and Kitchen Newsletter committee Library (Thiru Muruga Kirupanandha Variyar Swamy Library) Religious activities and preparation Temple Beautification Website Support Youth Activities and Education Infrastructure Maintenance Gardening and Outside Beautification Public Relations committee Fund Raising Activities Sound, Music System, Stage Lighting Engineer Networking Engineer Telephony Support Square Register Support Not finding an activity of interest in the list above, then simple come by the temple on a weekend and helps us in whatever capacity you can.

item.title: Temple Auditorium Rental
item.description: The auditorium with a capacity of 200 is available for rent for family functions such as wedding, naming ceremony, arangetram, seemantham etc., and community events. The stage, state-of-the-art sound system, high-end stage lighting, tables and chairs are included in the rental. This facility has private dressing rooms and rest-rooms. The temple has brand new kitchen and can order food for your events from our kitchen. Manager manages all bookings for Temple Auditorium, special Temple ceremonies, and Priest’s time.

item.title: Year-End Tax/Contribution Statement
item.description: How do we accept donations? There are four methods through which Murugan Temple accepts donations: Cash-Donations - receipt is provided at the temple Bank Cheques - receipt is provided at the temple or the check-transaction through your bank is the proof of payment Square Payments at Temple (using your credit-cards) - individual receipts and statements*1 will be available at SquareUp.com PayPal Payments via Temple Website - individual receipts and statements*1 will be available at PayPal.
